ctx: unfold evolve_t, bisim in HRt, HRa.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, X : Type TX : reduction_t A X B, B' : relation X HB : bicontrolled TX B HB' : bicontrolled TX B' F := chaining_r (X:=X) (bisim TX TX) : function2 X X X X G := Comp (star (X:=X)) (Union2 (identity (Y:=X)) (constant (bisim TX TX))) : relation2 X X -> relation2 X X F_mon : monotonic TX TX F FG : contains F G BG : contains (chaining_l (star B)) G B'G : contains (chaining_l (star B')) G R : relation X HRt : evolve_1 TX TX (T A) R (comp (star B) (F R)) HRa : evolve_a TX TX R (G R) HRt' : evolve_t TX TX (trans R) (comp (star B') (F (trans R))) HRa' : evolve_a TX TX (trans R) (G (trans R)) x, y : X H : R x y Unable to unify "evolve_a TX TX R (G R)" with "union_st (bisimulation TX TX) x y".

original: intros x y H. unfold incl, bisim. intros x0 y0 H0. unfold evolve_t, bisim in HRt, HRa. apply HRa, G_reverse. apply HRt. apply HRa'. apply H.
